data.title: Cristiano Ronaldo
data.meta_description: #1 Cristiano Ronaldo on the 2024 The World's Highest-Paid Athletes - In February 2021, Ronaldo became the first person in the world to reach 500 million
data.text:
Cristiano Ronaldo Is A Never-Ending Drama Show. Tuning Out Is Impossible.

As Portugal approaches a crucial Euro 2024 quarterfinal against France, it's hard to escape the Cristiano Ronaldo noise.

Mbappe Talks Facing Idol Ronaldo And Not Continuing His Real Madrid History

Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappe discussed facing his idol Cristiano Ronaldo and also continuing the history the Portuguese great made at the Bernabeu.

Mourinho Picks FC Barcelona Icon Messi Over Ronaldo As Best Of Generation

Jose Mourinho chose FC Barcelona legend Lionel Messi as the best playe his generation over compatriot Cristiano Ronaldo

Real Madrid Star Kylian Mbappe Could ‘Surpass Messi And Ronaldo As Richest Ever Footballer,’ Finance Guru Says

New Real Madrid ace Kylian Mbappe has been tipped to become the richest ever footballer who can surpass Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo.

Real Madrid Legend Says Messi Better Than Ronaldo And Tips Vinicius For Ballon d’Or

A Real Madrid legend believes FC Barcelona icon Lionel Messi pips Cristiano Ronaldo in the GOAT debate and tips Vinicius Jr. to beat Jude Bellingham to the Ballon d'Or.

Cristiano Ronaldo Wanted Revenge On Real Madrid, Ex-Teammate Reveals

Cristiano Ronaldo wanted revenge on Real Madrid when he left the club in 2018, according to a former Juventus teammate.

The Stealthy Revolution In Saudi Arabia Will Change The World

The old days of funding radical Islam by the Gulf and Saudi are gone. Now it's all about tourism, culture, fashion and glamor. And Cristiano Ronaldo

Real Madrid Legend Marcelo Makes Shocking Ronaldo Champions League Confession

Real Madrid legend Marcelo made a shocking confession about a goal Cristiano Ronaldo scored in the 2016/2017 Champions League last eight against Bayern Munich.

Cristiano Ronaldo Faces Investigation Over Obscene Hand Gesture In Saudi Arabia, Report Says

Cristiano Ronaldo, the world’s highest-earning athlete, reportedly faces an investigation into a hand gesture he made to fans in Saudi Arabia.

Cristiano Ronaldo Hails Real Madrid Comeback In Viral Video

Cristiano Ronaldo has gone viral for remembering his Real Marid days during a training session for current employers Al-Nassr.

Negotiations Underway As Saudis Offer $1.1 Billion For AS Roma

First it was Cristiano Ronaldo and English Premier League side Newcastle United: now Serie A clubs are appearing on the Saudi Arabian soccer radar.

Lionel Messi Will Take On Cristiano Ronaldo Again This January

As the European season drives on through a ferocious winter period the new MLS 2024 campaign is approaching and Messi will visit Cristiano in pre-season.

Lionel Messi Announces He Will Play In Saudi Arabia Against Cristiano Ronaldo

Lionel Messi has announced what could be his last ever showdown against generational rival Cristiano Ronaldo in Saudi Arabia later this month.

Cristiano Ronaldo Faces $1 Billion Class Action Lawsuit For Promoting Binance

Cristiano Ronaldo is facing a class action lawsuit from investors for his promotions and NFT collections for crypto exchange Binance.

Jude Bellingham Compared To Cristiano Ronaldo After Clasico Heroics

The 20-year-old England international has been compared to a Real Madrid great after his impressive start to life in the Spanish capital.
